title: Mix n' Match
content:
just interested in what you think about the type and its interaction with the cross form.

\> also, any input on design as a whole is great.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ATM.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516104704/http:/typophile.com/files/ATM.gif) | 12.82 KB |
author: Ampersanderson

comments.content: I gather it’s a pass machine. What is it for?

It is a poster for my BFA show. The theme is cultural iconography and how it represents what is "worshiped" in our society.

I'm linking two other images to give you context...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516104704im_/http:/typophile.com/files/01_large_3949.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516104704im_/http:/typophile.com/files/02_large_6303.gif)

I think (in the original attachment) that the elements look like they were just randomly plunked down inside the shape. There is too much white space and nothing seems connected to anything else. In contrast to the Mickey Mouse/rapper image which works much more dynamically with the shape and composition.
